fixes.name: Gross Utilization % (SSA)
fixes.dax_expression: ABS( SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)]) / MAX('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Limit (SSA)]) )
fixes.solution_explanation: Mapped Tableau Abs -> DAX ABS, SUM -> SUM, MAX -> MAX. Replaced Tableau column references with 'TableName'[ColumnName] format using the table migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy).
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (SUM, MAX), so it should be created as a measure.
